jobs.title: Software Engineer (Full stack)
jobs.description:
We have a front-end (iOS MVP), and looking for someone to help build the backend using an existing opensource platform. 

We are an early stage startup, getting the product ready for the release by Q1 2019. You will own the development of the platform and app. 

Strong technical skills.
